game_description: Zombie Gunner is a wave based zombie shooter. Experiment with the 13 different guns, everything from the AK-47 to the Sawn Off Shotgun. Open fire on zombies in three unique locations. Fend off the zombie hordes and see how long you can last!
review_1: Fun game with lots of potential, easy to play and some fun powerups. Would really love to see a smooth locomotion option, the snap turn can be disorienting and makes you lose orientation to the targets. Would also like to have audio cues for the zoms and of course more locations to play. Please keep working on this, I’d gladly pay for a fully developed game.
review_2: Okay I’m shook best game ever
